Key Match Events: Brayan Bello pitched 8 innings of two-hit ball with 9 strikeouts and 1 walk to lead the Boston Red Sox to a 3-0 victory over the Toronto Blue Jays.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Boston improved to 6-1 in Brayan Bello's last seven starts.
Others: Tyler O'Neill hit a two-run homer in the 8th inning to make it 3-0.
Chris Bassitt allowed one run on five hits and a walk, striking out nine before leaving with two outs in the 7th inning.
